repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
The manuscript is a commentary on the drama Saṅkalpasūryodaya written by Vedāntācārya. The manuscript is very damaged that is very difficult to read. The broken craked folio caused loss of information. This text is diffrent than the manuscript 35-3315.
After the blank folio two folios with some new text are seen. The handwriting is very different not very legible. The text is seems to be Tamil. It is incomplete.

msItem.title: Saṅkalpasūryodayavyākhyā
msItem.incipit: (1v 1) radāryamahaṃ vande varaṇīyaguṇākāraṃ vanaspatināmapi yanvāṇī vācaspati
msItem.explicit: (217r 9) (lacuna due to broken folio.) śamandesaṃ asmadekahitaiṣibhyaḥ asmākameva hiteśśatāṃ gṛhāssūryodayasvapnaśśu (lacuna due to broken folio.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 2 blank folio, 219 written folio (217 with the commentary and 2 folio of some tamil text)

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerels in the left margin. Folio numbers are lost due to marginal damage.
supportDesc.condition: All folio are broken. Delicate condition.

handNote.desc: Difficult to read due to condition and also is mostly syllables are mixed or overlapped.

additions.desc: number 67 is written in pink pencil on front guard. Sticker with printed number 67 glued and also number 70 written in blue pen.

listBibl.bibl: Saṃkalpasūryodaya of S'rī Veṅkaṭanātha : with the commentaries Prabhāvilāsa of Ahobala and Prabhāvalī of Nṛsiṃharāja by Veṅkaṭanātha; V Krishnamacharya, Adyar : Adyar Library 1948.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.

TEI.text:
(1v 1) radāryamahaṃ vande varaṇīyaguṇākāraṃ vanaspatināmapi yanvāṇī vācaspati
(217r 9) (lacuna due to broken folio.)śamandesaṃ asmadekahitaiṣibhyaḥ asmākameva hiteśśatāṃ gṛhāssūryodayasvapnaśśu (lacuna due to broken folio.)
